definitions.definition: a place where young children are cared for while their parents are at work; a day nursery or nursery school

examples.text: Her youngest child is at nursery now.
The children are at nursery three days a week.

definitions.definition: a room in a house where a baby sleeps
a room in a house where young children can play
a place where young plants and trees are grown for sale or for planting somewhere else

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Old French nourice ‘nurse’ (see nurse) + -ery.
